data.message: @eminem Hi men what's up? First of all I'm not going kiss you ass for an answer! Don't take me wrong! You are a fucking genius! A brilliant mind! You sold out a lot a places all over the world... Why not Portugal?? I might be wrong but I don't remember in your career history come here man! I believe your career is far to be over I know that! But give us a try! Over the years if you see the interviews, the many artist say Portugal are a great country, because we are great crowd! I don't want now if you answer! It's not about that is about try something in your life! You had many idols, like a example to do what you do! I'm not a rapper or even a singer I want go to army! I just want have the opportunity to see you life! Not everybody have a chance to travel the world to see you! Think about that man! With love! And the best for your future! @bigpoppabelmonte
